name: Abandoned (WDW Gaming)
description:
Some say there's no smoke without fire...

We're all familiar with urban legends, but how did they begin? You are Martin Harris and you run a local supernatural detective agency. You have dedicated your life to the discovery and the truth behind popular urban myths. Unlock the clues and solve the puzzles to find out how Royal Derby Hospital was abandoned or what really happened at Disney's abandoned theme park in the US. 

But beware, you might not like what you find...
